title: Internal Investigator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Receive a random clue to someone's role.
- Attempt to guess a player's role at any time. You may only input Town roles. The first time you're wrong, your abilities are locked until the next day. The second time you're wrong, you permanently lose all your abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The possible hints you may receive are:
* Role name's first letter
* Role's subalignment
* Numbers in the thousandth and hundredth places (example: 2974 will give 29XX as feedback) [Cannot be given as feedback when targeting Mainframe and Android players.]
* Amount of letters in the name
- You and your target are both notified you correctly guessed them. They learn your identity.
- You are immune to all effects that would make you believe a player is a role that isn't their own.
